fullName: In The Aeroplane Over The Sea - Neutral Milk Hotel

lines.lyrics: What a beautiful face
i have found in this place
that is circling all around the sun.
What a beautiful dream
that could flash on the screen
in a blink of an eye and be gone from me
soft and sweet

lines.chord: C                 D                G Em C D
lines.lyrics: let me hold it close and keep it here with me
and one day we will die
and our ashes will fly from the aeroplane over the sea
but for now we are young
let us lay in the sun
and count every beautiful thing we can see
Love to be

lines.chord: C               D              G   Em C D
lines.lyrics: in the arms of all i'm keepin here with me
what a curious life we have found here tonight
there is music that sounds from the street
there are lights in the cloud
Anne's ghost all around
hear her voice as it's rolling and ringing through me
soft and sweet

lines.chord: C                  D                G   Em C D
lines.lyrics: How the notes all bend and reach above the trees
now how i remember you
how i would push my fingers through
your mouth to make those muscles move
that make your voice so smooth and sweet
And now we keep where we don't know
All secrets sleep in winter clothes
with one you loved so long ago
now he don't even know his name
What a beautiful face
i have found in this place
that is circling all round the sun
and when we meet on a cloud
I'll be laughing out loud
I'll be laughing with everyone i see
Can't believe

lines.chord: C                 D            G  Em C D  G
lines.lyrics: how strange it is to be anything at all

title: In The Aeroplane Over The Sea
